entry.title: https://github.com/KhronosGroup/SPIRV-LLVM-Translator
entry.content: A tool and a library for bi-directional translation between SPIR-V and LLVM IR

entry.title: https://github.com/google/clspv
entry.content: Clspv is a compiler for OpenCL C to Vulkan compute shaders
